predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the U.S. Commerce Department (BIS) will add at least three China-based entities to the Entity List citing semiconductor export-control evasion or illicit acquisition of restricted AI chips.
predictions.verification_criteria: BIS press releases or Federal Register notices listing new Entity List additions between 2025-10-10 and 2025-11-30. Qualifying entries must be China-based and explicitly cite export-control evasion related to semiconductors or AI chips.
monitoring_signals: Reports of Chinese intermediaries acquiring restricted GPUs
NVIDIA/AMD statements on compliance and channel audits
predictions.rationale: Reports indicate continued AI chip leakage to China. Policy momentum favors new listings.

predictions.text: USD/CNH (Yahoo Finance: CNH=X) will trade at or above 7.40 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any intraday high at or above 7.4000 on CNH=X (Yahoo Finance) or equivalent reputable FX data source (Bloomberg/Refinitiv) during a UTC trading day between 2025-10-10 and 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: PBOC daily USD/CNY fixing vs. estimates
China macro prints (CPI, exports, credit, PMI)
Capital outflow controls and FX reserve moves
predictions.rationale: Dollar strength and China growth headwinds increase upside risk for USD/CNH.

predictions.text: EUR/USD (Yahoo Finance: EURUSD=X) will trade at or below 1.0300 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any intraday low at or below 1.0300 on EURUSD=X (Yahoo Finance) or equivalent reputable FX data source (Bloomberg/Refinitiv) between 2025-10-10 and 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Euro area PMIs and inflation surprises
ECB guidance vs. Fed policy path
Energy prices and gas supply risks
DXY momentum and UST yield differentials
predictions.rationale: Rate differentials favor the USD; European growth remains fragile.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI crude oil front-month futures (CL) will settle at or above $92.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: CME/NYMEX official front-month CL settlement price at or above $92.00 on any trading day from 2025-10-10 to 2025-11-30.
predictions.rationale: Tight balances and geopolitical risks keep upside tail for crude intact.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or above €45/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Official ICE Endex settlement for the front-month TTF contract at or above €45.00 per MWh on any trading day between 2025-10-10 and 2025-11-15.
monitoring_signals: European storage levels and weather forecasts
predictions.rationale: Seasonal heating demand and LNG/outage risks can lift TTF into winter.

predictions.text: U.S. distillate fuel oil inventories will decline by at least 4.0 million barrels week-over-week in at least one EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report table showing total distillate fuel oil stocks (excl. SPR) down ≥4.0 million barrels versus prior week in any report released by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Diesel cracks and exports to Latin America
predictions.rationale: Turnarounds and early heating demand can trigger a sharp distillate draw.

predictions.text: ISM Services PMI (headline) for October 2025 will print between 50.0 and 53.0 in ISM’s release due by 2025-11-05.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management official October 2025 Services PMI headline index value falls within [50.0, 53.0], per release posted by 2025-11-05 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: High-frequency card spending and travel bookings
predictions.rationale: Services growth appears resilient but moderating amid tighter financial conditions.

predictions.text: University of Michigan Consumer Sentiment Index (final) for October 2025 will print between 66.0 and 70.0 in the release due 2025-10-25.
predictions.verification_criteria: Final October 2025 headline index from University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers reported between 66.0 and 70.0 on the release published on or before 2025-10-25.
monitoring_signals: Labor market perceptions in preliminary survey
predictions.rationale: Stable but subdued sentiment given inflation, rates, and uneven income gains.

predictions.text: OpenAI’s Sora app (U.S. iOS) will rank in the Top 5 of the App Store Top Free chart on at least 5 distinct UTC days between 2025-10-10 and 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Third-party app intelligence (e.g., AppMagic, Sensor Tower) or archived App Store charts showing Sora ranked 1–5 in U.S. Top Free on ≥5 distinct UTC dates within the specified window.
monitoring_signals: Update cadence and new feature launches
predictions.rationale: Strong early traction suggests sustained top-chart presence through October.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Paramount Global and Warner Bros. Discovery will not announce a signed definitive merger or acquisition agreement, as evidenced by no joint press release and no definitive agreement filing on SEC EDGAR.
predictions.verification_criteria: Absence by 2025-11-30 of a publicly disclosed definitive agreement (merger agreement or similar) via joint press release and associated SEC filings (8-K, S-4) from either company on EDGAR.
monitoring_signals: Leak frequency from credible media on deal status
predictions.rationale: Financing constraints and regulatory complexity reduce near-term odds of a signed deal.
